articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Chae Hui Jong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Chae Hui Jong
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Friday sent a wreath to the bier of Chae Hui Jong, a recipient of Order of Kim Il Sung and former department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, expressing deep condolences on his demise.

articles.title: Inter-Korean High-level Contact Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean High-level Contact Held
 Panmunjom, February 14 (KCNA) -- A north-south high-level contact took place in Panmunjom on February 12 and 14.
					 Present there were the delegation of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK headed by Won Tong Yon, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, from the north side and members of the delegation with Kim Kyu Hyon, first vice-chief of the "National Security Section" of Chongwadae and secretary general of the "National Security Council", as chief delegate from the south side.
					
					 Both sides confirmed the will to open a new phase of national unity, peace, prosperity and independent reunification by improving the inter-Korean relations, sincerely discussed various issues arising between the north and the south and issued a joint press release.
					
					 
					
					　　　　Joint Press Release
						
					
					 The north and the south held a high-level contact in Panmunjom on February 12 and 14, 2014 and reached the following consensus:
					
					1. The north and the south agreed to hold the reunion of separated families and their relatives as scheduled.
					
					2. The north and the south agreed to refrain from slandering each other in order to promote mutual understanding and trust.
					
					3. The north and the south agreed to continue discussing the issues of mutual concern and make positive efforts to develop the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The north and the south agreed to hold a high-level contact at date convenient to both sides.
					
					　February 14, 2014.

articles.title: Sympathy to Algerian President
articles.content:
Sympathy to Algerian President
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy Thursday to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, in connection with a plane accident that occurred in Algeria, claiming huge casualties.
					 Kim in his message expressed deep condolences to the victims and their bereaved families through the Algerian president.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, on Feb. 10.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am glad to extend, on behalf of the people of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar and on my own behalf, warmest congratulations and best wishes to Your Excellency and, through you, to the people of the DPRK on the occasion of the auspicious birth anniversary of the great leader HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wholeheartedly wish Your Excellency happiness and success and the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda, on Jan. 27.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of myself and the government and people of the Republic of Uganda, extend warmest congratulations and wishes to Your Excellency and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 72nd birth anniversary of the great leader of the Korean people HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il achieved the powerful single-minded unity of the diligent Korean people and laid the firm foundation for economic development and social changes of your country with his devotional service for the people of the DPRK.
					
					 His feats will always shine in the hearts and minds of the Korean people.
					
					 Please accept my noblest tribute to Your Excellency.

articles.title: Greetings to Nepali PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Nepali PM
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting on Feb. 12 to Sushil Koirala upon his election as prime minister of Nepal.
					 The message wished him success in his work for achieving the political stability and unity of the country and its economic development, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of Palestine, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It was handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here with the approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The floral baskets and congratulatory letters were conveyed on Friday to DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan and Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and to Minister of the People's Armed Forces Jang Jong Nam by Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here who is doyen of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 23rd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues in humblest reverence for the peerlessly great men who made immortal contributions to accomplishing the human cause of independence and made a bow.

articles.title: Americans Fly Back
articles.content:
Americans Fly Back
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Donald Gregg, chairman of the U.S. Pacific Century Institute, and his party flew back on Friday.
					 During their visit they discussed with officials of relevant fields of the DPRK the issue for cooperation such as investment and economic development.

articles.title: 18th Kimjongilia Festival Opens
articles.content:
18th Kimjongilia Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The 18th Kimjongilia Festival opened here on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the festival are potted immortal flowers cultivated with much care by armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions and many other units, service personnel, people and school youth and children.
					
					 On display there are potted flowers of the sun presented by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic missions and missions of international bodies here, foreign friendship and solidarity organizations, foreigners and Chinese residents in the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, officials of the units, service personnel and people who displayed the flowers of the sun.
					
					 Also on hand were overseas Koreans delegations, overseas Koreans and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 He said that the festival is the one of flowers wishing for immortality representing longing and reverence of the Korean people and other progressive mankind for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits 18th Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits 18th Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the venue of the 18th Kimjongilia Festival on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Members of the corps looked round the venue decorated with Kimjongilia flowers presented by Korean and foreign people deeply revering Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					Hassan Reza Husseini, doyen of the military attaches corps, noted:
					
					I admired the boundless reverence of the service personnel and people of the DPRK for Kim Jong Il while looking round the exhibition hall. I, at the same time, keenly realized the single-minded unity of the Korean people around their leader. I wish the Korean people bigger success in their efforts for building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Juan Miguel Garcia Montano, military attache of the Cuban embassy here, noted:
					
					 The exhibition hall is pervaded with the ardent yearning of the Korean people for Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits for building a socialist thriving nation. They miss him very much, cultivating Kimjongilias. Kim Jong Il was a great man.
					
					 The guests also toured the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Here
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Delegations of overseas Koreans arrived here on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia headed by Chairman Pak Yong Ha, a delegation of the Koreans' Association of Economic and Cultural Exchange in Dandong, China led by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong and Kim Nam Su, secretary general of the Koreans' Council in New Zealand.
					
					 Arriving earlier was Ro Kil Nam, representative of Minjok Thongsin, an internet newspaper of Koreans in the United States.

articles.title: Korean People Enjoy January 15th of Lunar Year
articles.content:
Korean People Enjoy January 15th of Lunar Year
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean people celebrated the January 15th of the lunar year, a folk holiday.
					 Houses across the country overflowed with national emotion and optimism.
					
					 Families and neighbors sat together, had holiday dishes including boiled rice admixed with four other staple cereals and nine dried edible herbs and played folk amusement games such as Korean chess and yut-games.
					
					 Working people in Pyongyang had Pyongyang noodle, mung-bean pancakes and other folk dishes at service networks.
					
					 National flavor was pervaded with special dish service at service networks across the country including restaurants in the folk street of Sariwon City and Okgye Restaurant in Haeju City.
					
					 As the joyful day got dark, people went to Moran Hill and the bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang and scenic spots across the country to enjoy the full moon.
					
					 From the olden times, people talked about their wishes, looking at the full moon at the January 15th of the lunar year.
					
					 On this evening the people across the country hardened their will to translate into a reality the dream and ideal of the happiness of their families and the beautiful future of the country, holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their father.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
 Beijing, February 13 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on February 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Liu Zhenmin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Ji said in his speech at the reception that Kim Jong Il visited China several times, making a great contribution to boosting the traditional DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 The Korean people will make joint efforts with the Chinese people to more beautifully adorn the flower garden of the traditional DPRK-China friendship true to the noble intention of the top leaders of the two countries this year marking the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and China, and to defend the peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world, he stressed.
					
					 Wang said that Kim Jong Il who is alive in the minds of the Korean people is a close friend of the Chinese people.
					
					 The peoples of the two countries linked by the same mountain and rivers have always shared joy and sorrow and the Chinese party and government value the friendship with the DPRK very much, Wang said, expressing the will to further expand exchange and cooperation between the two countries this year marking the 65th anniversary of the diplomatic relations between China and the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Turns DPRK into Military Giant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Turns DPRK into Military Giant
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 2nd anniversary of the conferment of the title of DPRK Generalissimo on leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On the anniversary, the servicepersons and people of the DPRK recall the undying feats he performed to develop the Korean People's Army into an invincible army and turn the country into a world-level military giant.
					
					 Kim Jong Il dedicated all his life to the cause of the Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 He started his revolutionary activities with inspection of KPA units, advancing the slogan "Let us fight devotedly for the great leader!"
					
					 He strengthened the KPA into a-match-for-a-hundred army devotedly defending their leader, an army of the leader and the party.
					
					 When the country was in hard time, he held higher the banner of the Songun politics to defend the destiny of the country and the dignity and honor of the nation. With the Songun politics as an all-powerful treasured sword, he turned the DPRK into an invincible power and the fortress of the revolution any enemies dare not attack.
					
					 In those days he, with strong patriotic will and superhuman energy, made a ceaseless journey of military inspections, repeatedly visiting the frontline posts on Chol Pass, Mt. Osong, Cho Islet and Panmunjom and other areas. He inspected many military units for 17 years till the last moments of his life, more than one hundred a year on an average.
					
					 The present might of the KPA as the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army and the dignity of the DPRK as a military giant would be unthinkable without the devoted and energetic efforts of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conferment of the title of the Generalissimo was a token of the people's appreciation of his Songun leadership feats.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Revolutionary Site in Mt. Jangja
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Revolutionary Site in Mt. Jangja
 Kanggye, February 14 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people of various circles and school youth and children visit the Revolutionary Site in Mt. Jangja every day in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The site is located in Jagang Province. Kim Jong Il stayed there for more than 20 days during the Fatherland Liberation War where he hardened his will to bring about the bright future of the country after victory in the war, wishing President Kim Il Sung good health.
					
					 Preserved there with much care are the house where Kim Jong Il stayed, a small desk, school things, clock, etc. used by him.
					
					 There are also the study site, singing site, site of playing soldiers, wrestling site, etc where he led his comrades to prepare themselves to be revolutionary talents with versatile knowledge and strong bodies.
					
					 The visitors get a good knowledge of the noble personality of Kim Jong Il, while looking round different places of the site.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges Japan to Liquidate Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges Japan to Liquidate Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea made public a commentary on Feb. 11 urging Japan to liquidate the past crimes related to sexual slavery, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. 
					 The commentary said:
					
					 Public is becoming increasingly vocal to demand the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					
					 Japan is still evading the blame for the past crimes and denying even the statements of Kono and Murayama which admitted some crimes. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities and political camp are talking about the relations with Japan, far from making active efforts for the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery. 
					
					 The primary issue to be settled is to force Japan to make an apology and reparation for sexual slavery. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave themselves to make Japan admit illegality and blame for the crimes and liquidate the past.

articles.title: Heavy Snowfall Hits East Coastal Area of S. Korea
articles.content:
Heavy Snowfall Hits East Coastal Area of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Heavy snow fell in the east coastal area of south Korea, causing damage, according to south Korean KBS on Wednesday.
					 Snow registered 194 cm to the maximum, causing deaths in Ulsan.
					
					 Facilities attached to schools and factories collapsed and farmhouses were heavily damaged in south Korean Kangwon Province and North Kyongsang Province.
					
					 Roads were blocked in several places and passenger plane service hindered.

articles.title: S. Korean Society Deplored by Its Paper
articles.content:
S. Korean Society Deplored by Its Paper
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- An article deploring south Korean society was posted on the south Korean internet paper Thongil News on January 25.
					 The article said that the gap between the rich and the poor is widening in the educational and other sectors in south Korea and its economy is going perilous.
					
					 People lost their hope and dream in society in which their future is not ensured even though they work hard, it noted.
					
					 The usual greetings "How are you?" show south Korean society where people are not fine, it said, adding that the popular masses should become the true masters of society.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Thailand
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Thailand
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- A Thai preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on Feb. 7.
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in China
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in China
Beijing, February 13 (KCNA) -- A film show took place in China on Feb. 12 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 It was co-sponsored by the Jindallae Children's Foundation, the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China and the Arab Information Centre in China.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 A director of the Executive Council of the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China said that he was very pleased to celebrate the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il together with the Korean people, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu on February 16, 1942 and performed undying exploits in the struggle for the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and human cause of independence all his life.
					
					 I wish the Korean people big successes in their efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants watched Korean films.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Russia
Moscow, February 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Russia on Feb. 10 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 It was sponsored by the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 On display at the venue of the event were photos showing the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were officials of the State Duma and Foreign Ministry of Russia and the association and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Petrov, chairman of the association, made a report to be followed by speeches of Vorontsov, first vice-chairman of the association, and others.
					
					 Noting the Day of the Shining Star is a common holiday of the Korean people and their friends, the reporter and speakers praised Kim Jong Il as a peerless patriot who successfully carried out the cause of perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung and dedicated his all to the country and its people.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 So, the Korean people ardently revere him, holding him in high esteem.
					
					 The Korean people are working hard to embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 His cause is now being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter and speakers sincerely wished the Korean people bigger successes in the struggle for building an economic power, united close around Kim Jong Un, saying they would make positive efforts to further strengthen the traditional relations of friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Organization in Its Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Organization in Its Bulletin
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was carried by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its bulletin on February 5.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the idea of the Songun revolution and the tasks to successfully accomplish the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Russia
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The Kimjongilia, Korean photo, book and handicraft exhibition opened with due ceremony in Nakhodka, Russia on February 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed on the front of the exhibition hall were the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were works of the peerlessly great persons, books introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The first vice mayor of Nakhodka City in his speech said that he was glad that the exhibition opened in the city on the occasion of the 72nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, expressing belief that the Korean people will achieve great success in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The exhibition will last till February 23.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Papers of various countries carried special write-ups to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Malaysian paper Guang Ming Daily on Feb. 8 carried an article titled "The greatest exploit" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il inspecting the Dwarf Pine Post of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 The greatest exploit of Kim Jong Il is that he protected socialist Korea and turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power in which the people achieved single-minded unity and a nuclear weapons state by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 At the end of the last century the DPRK could not but undergo the worst hardships and trials due to the unexpected demise of President Kim Il Sung, a series of natural disasters and escalated moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 After basing himself with a scientific analysis of the prevailing situation, Kim Jong Il held higher the banner of Songun.
					
					 He was, indeed, the sun of Songun who protected the sovereignty of the country and exalted the dignity of the nation in the hardest period.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Bangla Times on Feb. 7 carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism" accompanied with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Noting his love for the country was most sincere and ardent, the paper said that Kim Jong Il's patriotism serves as a beacon and compass which help all the Korean people take the road of genuine patriotism.
					
					 The Indonesian paper Suara Karya on the same day carried an article praising him for establishing the state structure system with the National Defence Commission as its pivot, providing a firm legal guarantee for the Songun politics and bringing about an eternal foundation for the everlasting prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries between Jan. 29 and Feb. 5 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 They included a meeting, photo exhibition and film show in Mexico, a film show in Guinea and a Korean book and photo exhibition in Malaysia.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos showing the successes made by the Korean people in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said in a speech:
					
					 Eternal General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Il was a distinguished thinker and theoretician.
					
					 He was also an elder statesman who firmly protected the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and rescued the global movement of socialism by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 We sincerely hope that the Korean people would register big successes in their struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Alpha Cabinet Keita, commander of the first commando force of the Almami Samori Toure barracks of the Guinean Army lauded Kim Jong Il as the greatest man who dedicated his all to the victorious advance of the socialist cause in the DPRK and the cause of global independence.
					
					 As the Korean people holds Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their supreme leader, the undying exploits performed by the preceding leaders will shine forever, he added.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised by Bulgarian and Indonesian Figures
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised by Bulgarian and Indonesian Figures
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in Sofia, Bulgaria and seminars by the Diversity Party of Indonesia and an Indonesian company on February 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The chairman of the Bulgarian preparatory committee for celebrating the 72nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu on February 16, 1942 and grew up to be the great revolutionary. 
					
					 His greatest exploit is that he developed and enriched the Juche idea, fathered by President Kim Il Sung, into the guiding idea in the era of independence. 
					
					 He also smashed the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended the sovereignty and security of the country with his original Songun politics. 
					
					 He made a great contribution to ensuring peace and security of the world.
					
					 The chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the greatest man who put the power of the DPRK on the highest level with his distinguished leadership ability and warm love for the country and its people. 
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode of socialism and, by dint of it, defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and developed the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by British Organizations
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Feb. 8 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Noting the Korean people and progressive humankind are significantly celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as the Day of the Shining Star, the statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the faithful successor to President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea.
					
					 His work "On the Juche Idea" served as the banner powerfully encouraging the world people in their struggle for national independence and emancipation.
					
					 He, in his various works including "Socialism Is a Science", dealt a telling blow at the anti-socialist moves of the imperialists, modern revisionists and renegades of socialism.
					
					 He brought about a victory in the showdown with U.S. imperialism and turned the DPRK into a military power with nuclear deterrence and a socialist fortress by pursuing his original Songun politics.
					
					 He steered the Korean people's drive for building a thriving nation through his ceaseless field guidance.
					
					 We are recollecting with deep emotion his shining exploits on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically advancing to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They will as ever invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism and surely win a final victory under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Chae Hui Jong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Chae Hui Jong
 Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 14 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Chae Hui Jong, condecorado con la Orden Kim Il Sung y ex jefe del departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, expresando profundas condolencias por su deceso.

articles.title: Tiene lugar contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Tiene lugar contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea
　Phanmunjom, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 12 y 14 en Phanmunjom el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea.
					　En la ocasion participaron por la parte Norte la delegacion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Won Tong Yon, y por la surena los integrantes de la delegacion con Kim Kyu Hyon, primer subjefe de la "Seccion de Seguridad Nacional" de Chongwadae y secretario general del "Consejo de Seguridad Nacional" del Sur de Corea, como su delegado-jefe.
					
					　Ambas partes confirmaron la voluntad de abrir la nueva era de la unidad nacional, la paz, la prosperidad y la reunificacion independiente al mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, debatieron con sinceridad sobre varios problemas que se presentan entre el Norte y el Sur y publicaron el comunicado conjunto.
					
					　
					
					　Comunicado conjunto
					
					　
					
					　El Norte y el Sur sostuvieron los dias 12 y 14 de febrero de 2014 el contacto de alto nivel en Phanmunjom y llegaron al consenso en los siguientes puntos:
					
					1. El Norte y el Sur decidieron realizar como lo previsto el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.
					
					2. El Norte y el Sur acordaron no difamar ni calumniar a la contraparte para fomentar el entendimiento y la confianza mutuos.
					
					3. El Norte y el Sur quedaron en seguir consultando los asuntos de interes mutuo y esforzarse activamente por desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales. 
					
					El Norte y el Sur acordaron sostener el contacto de alto nivel en los dias convenientes.
					
					　　　　　　El 14 de febrero de 2014.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente argelino por accidente aereo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente argelino por accidente aereo
　Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 13 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, en relacion con que hubo un accidente aereo en Argelia que causo grandes perdidas humanas.
					　En su mensaje, el remitente expreso por conducto del destinatario la mas profunda compasion y condolencias a las victimas y sus familiares.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del presidente de Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del presidente de Myanmar
 Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10  Thein Sein, presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar.
					 La misiva senala:
					
					 Estoy contento de que con motivo del jubiloso dia del nacimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, hago llegar en nombre del pueblo de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar y en el mio propio nuestra mas cordial felicitacion y maximos votos a Su Excelencia y por su conducto al pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Aprovecho esta oportunidad para desear de todo corazon a Su Excelencia la felicidad y exitos y a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el incesante progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del presidente ugandes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del presidente ugandes
 Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 27 de enero el presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					 La misiva sigue:
					
					 En ocasion del 72o aniversario del natalicio de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, gran Dirigente del pueblo coreano, envio a Su Excelencia, al gobierno y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mi mas calurosa felicitacion y salutacion en nombre del gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica de Uganda y en el mio propio.
					
					 Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il logro la potente unidad monolitica del laborioso pueblo coreano a traves de su abnegado servicio para el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y preparo la firme base para el desarrollo economico y la transformacion social de su pais.
					
					 Sus hazanas seran inmortales en el corazon del pueblo coreano.
					
					 Reciba mi mas alta consideracion.
